description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S73a) to vary condition 2 (Approved Drawings) of planning permission ref: 243711HH dated 14/11/2024 for: Reconfiguration and refurbishment of existing dwellinghouse; first floor extension and replacement of existing pitched roof with flat and green roof; installation of photovoltaic panels; single storey side extension with green roof and roof terrace (following demolition of existing garage); alterations to fenestration to front, side and rear elevations; replacement of existing windows with aluminium framed windows; rendering front elevation of existing house; and associated landscaping and boundary works. Amendment seeks to replace courtyard (side elevation) with a rooflight above; reconfiguration and width reduction of front window; change of kitchen roof from hipped roof to a flat roof; size reduction of side window above approved courtyard (Amended description proposal)
